author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Tjong Very Sumito and Others v Antig Investments Pte Ltd
counsel: Michael Hwang SC and Charis Tan (instructed) / Nicholas Narayanan (Nicholas & Co) for the appellant/defendant; Manjit Singh (Manjit Govind & Partners) for the respondents/plaintiffs
tags-parsed: Arbitration/Stay of court proceedings/Mandatory stay under International Arbitration Act (Cap 143A, 2002 Rev Ed)/Whether dispute in fact existed/Whether positive assertion of dispute by a party sufficient to stay proceedings/Section 6(2) International Arbitration Act (Cap 143A, 2002 Rev Ed)
